top_comments.comment: Absolutely gorgeous!! I am now going to have to try this, especially when I don’t have a lot of paint left to do a piece! You’re videos are always so informative and inspiring. I never knew you could add some paint to the topcoat!

comments_since_last_sample.body: I love black wash!!! Obsessed with this one 😍😍😍
I wish that I could find a sideboard like that!  That's exactly what I'm needing.

Absolutely gorgeous!! I am now going to have to try this, especially when I don’t have a lot of paint left to do a piece! You’re videos are always so informative and inspiring. I never knew you could add some paint to the topcoat!
Omgosh!!! I’m pretty sure this is my new favorite❤️❤️❤️
Can I ask why you do t use stripper to take the majority of the paint off, to begin with?????
I noticed you did not go with a grain of the wood on the sides with the topcoat… And that is OK?… I am new to this furniture painting business
Absolutely beautiful but I loved it raw as well💜🕉
That turned out beautifully!!!!!! Love it!

Love it!
Been wanting to do my entree table, (about 4’LX20”W) which is already a raw black but I don’t look like the look of it.
